title: VR-based science laboratory skills acquisition program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Experimental skills training using VR simulation in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment. Designed as a supplementary program to compensate for environments with limited access to actual experimental equipment.

learning_goals: Students can perform pipetting techniques with 90% accuracy or higher in VR simulations at least three times.
Students can transfer experimental procedures with 70% or higher technical proficiency to real laboratory settings after VR training.
Students’ confidence in performing scientific experiments increases by 20% or more compared to pre-assessment by the program’s conclusion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
